page.title: 18GAMES ON THE PIT MOUNT
page.content: 'The{pit mount}is the biggest and most famous.The other two are called the mini pit and the B.M.X.track.If I had to move away from the village I would never forget the pit as it means a lot to me.In the summer we go to the{pit {mount}for{picnics}and afterwards play games like{tig}and{hide and seek.}Then we go down to the{waterfall.' 'I think that if the{pit mount}wasn't there, there would be nothing to do.No really{good walks}to take your dog or puppy on.I have a puppy and up there it's safe for me to let him off the lead.In the winter when there is snow on the ground it's great for{sledging. We use peat bags or plastic bags.' 'My dad used to go{jogging}up there and I go to{fly my kite.' 'Sometimes we just go up there for a {rest}and{quiet.'
